GSD.product_version: versions from v4.14 to before v5.10.137
GSD.description:
net: hinic: avoid kernel hung in hinic_get_stats64()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.137 by commit e74f3097a9c713ce855cda07713393bcc23a005d, it was introduced in version v4.14 by commit edd384f682cc2981420628b769a1929db680f02f. For more details please see the references link.
